column4: hey, I'm having an issue where I can access irc and stuff like that, but I can't view websites in firefox or lynx. I am running over a wireless router
Has anyone had this network problem where they can connect to things like irc, and games, but can't access any websites like google???
probly lives in his momma's basement eating hot pockets getting fat, not showering, and wondering why no girl wants him
now since the drama is over, DOES anyone know anything about networking that would cause me to not access websites in *ANY* browser?
all outgoing connections to any server on remote port 80 would be blocked in the firewall perhaps
it kinda kicks in and out
got 3 pc's on the router with only net use being secondlife being run
can you ping the remote servers that you're trying to access WHILE you are unable to access the site
